name: Nian
description:
Happy Chinese New Year 2015!

Nian is a twitch-action game based on the Chinese Lion Dance. Use the magical drum to maneuver the Nian through obstacles while collecting special items. Will this year bring you good luck and fortune? You'll need both and lot more to make it through this game!


Features
- 27 Unique Levels
- Special Bonus Rounds
- 8 Different Nian Color Variations
- Beautiful Paper Craft Art Style
- Twitch-Action Based Game Play
